Instructions.Value: An ally of {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Name} here in {TGT_SYSTEM.name} stands accused of a long list of illegal, unethical and deplorable activities. Proof of her guilt was being transported to a spaceport, for safe-keeping off-planet, when it was attacked by unidentified mercenary forces. The convoy narrowly escaped and we need you to protect it while we arrange for a DropShip pickup.
Protect Convoy as they Embark on the DropShip
